document.full_text: former president jimmy carter said on monday he hopes to meet north korean leader kim jong-il and his son and presumed heir during a visit this week that will concentrate on pyongyang's nuclear program and foodaid needs.
document.title: carter says hopes to meet north korea leader and son
lines_and_colors: former president jimmy carter said on monday he hopes to meet north korean leader kim jong-il and his son and presumed heir during a visit this week that will concentrate on pyongyang's nuclear program and foodaid needs.
